Columns.Description: The logical server name of the SQL DW.

Columns.Name: ResourceGroup

Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The operation associated with log record.
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: The category of the log.
Columns.Name: Category

Columns.Description: The requestId of the execution requests.
Columns.Name: RequestId

Columns.Name: StepIndex

Columns.Name: OperationType

Columns.Name: DistributionType

Columns.Description: The location type of the execution requests.
Columns.Name: LocationType

Columns.Description: The status of the execution requests.
Columns.Name: Status

Columns.Description: The errorId of the execution requests.
Columns.Name: ErrorId

Columns.Description: The startTime (UTC) of the execution requests.
Columns.Name: StartTime

Columns.Description: The end compile time (UTC) of the execution requests.
Columns.Name: EndCompileTime

Columns.Description: The end time (UTC) for the execution requests.

Columns.Description: The SQL command of the execution requests.

Columns.Description: The name of the table
